nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.delayedinput.DelayedStructureSpecificationInputRequest
public final class DelayedStructureSpecificationInputRequest extends DelayedInputRequest<String>
Represents a DelayedInputRequest to specify which structure was meant out of a list of multiple.

Pim

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> get(Duration timeout, List<AbstractStructure> options, IPlayer player, ILocalizer localizer, ITextFactory textFactory, StructureSpecificationManager structureSpecificationManager)
      Asks the user to specify which one of multiple structures they want to select.

      Note that this will block the current thread until either one of the exit conditions is met.

      Parameters:
      timeout - The amount of time to give the user to provide the input.

      If the user fails to provide input within this timeout window, an empty result will be returned.

      options - The list of options they can choose from.
      player - The player that is asked to make a choice.
      Returns:
      The specified structure if the user specified a valid one. Otherwise, an empty Optional.

    • cleanup

      protected void cleanup()
      Description copied from class: DelayedInputRequest
      Runs after the request has closed. Either because input was provided or because the request timed out.

      See DelayedInputRequest.getStatus().

      Overrides:
      cleanup in class DelayedInputRequest<String>
